channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Honor Magic 8 Pro : à peine lancé, ce nouveau fleuron s’affiche déjà avec 300 € de moins
item.description: Le nouveau fleuron de Honor, le Magic 8 Pro, profite de 300 euros de remise grâce à un code promo. Une belle offre pour un smartphone premium tout juste sorti et noté 8/10 par nos soins.

item.title: This simple setting changed how I used Google Maps forever – and it could bring big benefits to you too
item.description: The map details feature in Google Maps has improved my travel for good. Here’s how to use it.

item.title: The Best Date-Night Boxes of 2026, Tested With My Hinge Dates
item.description: I tested 10 popular date-night boxes with people I met on Hinge. From writing love notes to trying out sex swings, these kits fulfilled their promise to keep dates interesting.

item.title: How to Use Physics to Escape an Ice Bowl
item.description: Here are three smart tricks, based on an understanding of frictional forces, to beat a slippery slope.

item.title: Nobody Wants This season 3: everything we know so far about the hit Netflix show’s return
item.description: Nobody Wants This season 3 is coming later this year – here's everything we know so far.

item.title: Man City vs Chelsea Free Streams: TV Channels & Preview for WSL 2025/26 Clash
item.description: Here are the Man City vs Chelsea Women's Super League 2025/26 live streams, broadcasters, and TV channels.

item.title: Best Valentine’s Day Gifts (2026): Legos, Karaoke, Digital Frames, and More
item.description: The holiday of romance is just around the corner. Don’t give something boring.

item.title: I tested the earbuds that morph from workout headphones to open 'buds and it works — but that's only half the story
item.description: Anker's Soundcore Aerofit 2 Pro present a novel idea, and the gimmick works well, but they have some other issues.

item.title: Believe the hype - the Logitech MX Master 4 really is the best mouse I've ever used
item.description: If you're looking for a mouse upgrade, the Logitech MX Master 4 could be the one for you.

item.title: Man Utd vs Fulham Live Streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch Man Utd vs Fulham live streams online and from anywhere, as the Red Devils chase another win at Old Trafford.

item.title: The Best Chocolate Boxes of 2026 for Valentine’s Delivery
item.description: We tasted dozens of chocolates to find the best-tasting delivery boxes for your true love, self-love, or your lovely mother.

item.title: These 3 ‘addictive’ social media UX features are on trial
item.description: New lawsuits say that these key features are purposefully designed to keep kids scrolling. The world’s biggest tech companies are facing a legal showdown that could fundamentally change the way that social media is designed.

item.title: Google Meet et la France, Apple AirTag 2 et WinRAR… – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Encore une semaine riche en actualités tech. Voici, entre autres, quelques sujets qu'il ne fallait pas manquer : l'administration français qui va bloquer Google Meet en interne, l'annonce d'un nouveau AirTag par Apple ou encore une alerte sécurité sur WinRAR.
